sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/User.service'; import { User } from 'src/app/model/User'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent implements OnInit { RegisterForm=new FormGroup({}); constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder, private userService: UserService, private router: Router) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.RegisterForm = this.formBuilder.group({ nomUtilisateur: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(3)]], prenomUtilisateur: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(3)]], email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]], motDePasse: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(8), Validators.pattern('[0-9]{8}')]], numTel: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.pattern('[0-9]{8}')]], role: ['', Validators.required], interet: ['', Validators.required] }); } persistUser() { if (this.RegisterForm.valid) { const formData = this.RegisterForm.value; const UserData: User = { nomUtilisateur: formData.nomUtilisateur, prenomUtilisateur: formData.prenomUtilisateur, email: formData.email, numTel: formData.numTel, motDePasse: formData.motDePasse, role: formData.role, interet: formData.interet }; this.userService.ajouterUser(UserData).subscribe( (response) => { console.log('Utilisateur ajouté avec succès:', response); // Redirect to profile or any other page this.router.navigate(['/profile']); }, (error) => { console.error('Erreur lors de l\'ajout de l\'utilisateur:', error); } ); } } } Register Page

Register

Last name is required
Last name should be at least 3 characters
First name is required
First name should be at least 3 characters
Email is required
Email must respect the rules
Password is required
Password should be at least 8 characters
Password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, and a number
Telephone is required
Telephone should be 8 numbers
Role is required
Interest is required
